version_description:
- Add support for TextExpander fill-ins
- Avoid multiple alerts when editing documents in Dropbox
- Fix duplicate folder when creating new folder in iCloud
- Fix incorrect capitalization when using third-party keyboards
- Other minor bug fixes

- Upload images to Medium
- Bug fixes

- New: 'Open in place' for iCloud Drive documents;
- New: Support for adding a table of contents to Markdown documents using the {{TOC}} placeholder;
- Improved: PDF exporting and printing;
- Fixed crash when adding italics for users that had Acc

- Fix in-app purchase error that some customers were experiencing
- Improve WordPress setup for certain websites
- Do not generate anchors in headings unless Table of Contents is present in document
Fixed a crash affecting some users.
Fix issue when inserting image references on iPad

* Publishing features are now available to all users; in app purchase no longer needed;
* Support for publishing articles to your Medium publications;
* Bug fixes.

- Update Dropbox API to version 2
- Fix issue when presenting the Share popover on iPad devices

- Fix issue where Dropbox documents would stop receiving changes

New in version 2.8.1
- Update Dropbox API to version 2

- Update user interface for iPhone X
- Fix internal links not working in Markdown preview
- Fix Blogger authorization
- Improvements on Dropbox sync

- Adjusted font size in Markdown preview and export
- Bug fixes in Dropbox synchronization
- Enable password auto-fill when setting up WordPress or Tumblr

- Dark mode support with option to match the system appearance
- Support for opening R Markdown documents
- Fix miscellaneous user interface issues
Fix crash when starting iCloud sync on iOS 13
Fix for the 'New Document' button not working in some cases
